data.message:
Oh you motherfuckers ok I'm putting cases on all you bitches
You think you can do this to me
You motherfuckers will be playing Basketball in Pelican Bay when I get finish with you shoe program nigga 23 hour lockdown.
I'm the man up in this piece you would never see the light of day who the fuck you think you fucking with I'm the police I run shit here you just live here. Yeah that's right you better walk away cuz I'ma burn this mother fucker down King Kong ain't got shit on me , Oh shit I forgot that's Training Day  wrong movie. Lol
